release.change: New: Option to sign up for ForceDoze Beta testing. Go to Menu - Settings - About ForceDoze and tap on 'Sign up for beta testing'
New: Ability to open the Battery optimization system activity from Whitelist
Changed: Improvements to Doze Battery stats. New UI and more stats!
Changed: Doze Battery stats now only stores the most recent 100 entries (50 sessions) to reduce clutter
